My holisitic veterinarian recommended this to do the same for my dogs.I've been pleased with the positive results.  No achey feelings or frequent colds for me anymore..  No more skin issues and allergies for my dogs.

This is exactly what I needed to get me in the right state of mind and mood to meet a busy day's demands. Seven minutes of deep breaths, stopping the clock to center myself, putting a positive spin on things. It takes 21 consecutive days of doing something to form a habit. I'm glad I got this.  This will be a very good habit to acquire.  Good for me, good for my pets, and good for the people I deal with during the day.

Large graphics makes it easy to see the numbers and functions.  Buttons are easy to push.  Screen has good contrast even under outdoors in bright sunlight.  Screen is also easy to read in dim light indoors. Good size for me at my desk.  I tend to be somewhat messy while pushing papers, etc. around.  The large size of this calculator makes it easy to find in the desk clutter. I used to lose my smaller calculator often.  I'm glad I got this big one so I don't have to keep shuffling papers to search for a smaller calculator.

UPDATE, June 26:  Purchased Granite Gear Long Howl dog back pack in Size XL (from Amazon.com) for our 100+ lbs mastiff.  Fits him perfectly.  He is a pretty laid back dog, so he accepted it with no reaction.  We went for a short 3 mile hike on a sunny, warm day.  No signs of chafing under his armpits! Bags didn't shift around (I weighed each pocket with a bottle of Smart Water).  My smaller dog (57 lbs, chest measures 27 inches around) has an older model Ruffwear back pack (non-removable saddle bags).  I will be adding cushioning wraps to the straps on her Ruffwear backpack.  She has hardly any fur...and her armpits were showing wear (skin was turning brighter pink-red), so I think she'll need padding around the Ruffwear straps.The actual color of the pack I received is a medium orangey-red, rather than a pure red.  I like this color, so no complaints in the color dept.5 star rating is a reflection of my research of other consumers' reviews and my own experience with this pack.I was going to order the Ruffwear Palisades dog pack. The Ruffwear Palisades dog pack also has removable saddlebags.  Plus,  I liked the Ruffwear harness design which didn't cover the dog as much and therefore allowed more air circulation (for hot weather).However,I changed my mind and decided to purchase the Granite Gear Long Howl because of a couple of reviews by users who said the reason they chose Granite Gear Long Howl over the Ruffwear Palisades is the Long Howl has wider, cushioned straps that did not chafe their dogs (compared to the narrower straps on the Ruffwear pack which chafed their dogs).My primary concern in putting gear on my dogs is their comfort; I didn't want a hike ruined by discovering my dogs were suffering from chafed skin (like blisters from ill fitting hiking shoes for me).SIZING INFORMATION:  Measure the circumference of your dog's chest with a regular seamstress flexible tape measure around the widest part of the dog's chest,just behind the dog's front legs. XS fit Chest sizes 23-26 Inches  S fit Chest sizes 26-29 Inches  M fit Chest sizes 29-32 Inches  L fit Chest sizes 32-35 Inches XL fit Chest sizes 35-38 InchesIf the XL is a tad small, you could take the dog pack to a sail maker and have the straps lengthened; ask the sail maker to include padding when adding the extra length.  Or, if you are handy and have a sewing machine that will do heavy duty sewing (jeans denim and similar projects), you could extend the straps yourself.  Just be sure you have sufficient padding on the addition so your dog doesn't suffer from chafing.

Each day, I put a tablet in the bowlful of fresh drinking water I put out for my dogs.  I do the same for the bowl of water I give my cats.  Sometimes I forget to add the tablet and I notice the difference right away in their behavior.  I take it myself when I'm feeling a bit stressed from having lots of things to do in a given space of time. I take other homeopathic medicines by BH/Heel and am very satisfied and pleased with all of them. I began taking homeopathic medicines after reading a book by Dana Ullman and after being evaluated and treated by author and Western trained physician, Roger Morrison MD who runs the Hahneman Clinic in Richmond, CA.

I bought this for my newly adopted dog whom I rescued from a Los Angeles County, CA high kill animal shelter. I had used a Gentle Leader Calming Cap size M,  before for another reactive dog I'd also rescued and it worked wonders for her.  I would have given this Large size cap a 5 star rating except it was too small to comfortably fit on my 110 mastiff's head.  It was too snug for him to open and close his eyes comfortably.  I guess I could have trained him gradually to accept wearing it, but I don't want to force or coerce him.  I'm hoping to find a Calming Cap that is an XL size or an XXL size.  There is another company that makes these...however, they do not offer an XL or XXL  size cap. The concept is excellent. I think I might have to be creative and make my own, with my sewing skills.

So glad I spent the extra money to order this.  I live in California.  My car is always parked outside and not a garage. This sunshade makes a huge difference in sunny weather. Highly recommended in both cold and hot temperature climates.

During childhood in Hawaii, we always had a Moringa tree growing in our yard.  We ate the leaves and bean pods and roots. We dried the seeds and crushed them and rubbed the cold-pressed oil on our complexions.  When I left for college and moved to a cold New England climate, I stopped ingesting and using Moringa as a food and skin emollient because it was unavailable in stores.  Just a year ago, I discovered Moringa products online (from Moringa For Life farms) and started using Moringa again.  What an improvement! I ingest Moringa powder in and on practically everything I eat and drink.  I 2x/daily moisturize my complexion with the cold-pressed oil. People are telling me my skin looks greatly improved...smoother, younger looking.  The only thing I've changed in my beauty regimen of keeping my skin clean and moisturized, is adding Moringa oil to my facial and body creams and moisturizers. When people ask me lately why my skin is looking so much smoother and younger, I tell them about Moringa. I use Moringa oil on my scalp after my daily shampoo, also.  It absorbs so thoroughly into your skin and doesn't leave a greasy feel.I have added Moringa powder to my dogs' and cats' meals and I can see the improvement in their shiny coats (plus, their poop doesn't smell as bad).  I'm so glad Moringa has become mainstream.  It's an ancient health product (Ayrveda) and now it's being used all over the world to improve nutrition.  Feed your body and feed your skin with Moringa.  I think you'll be very happy with the results.  You can do a Google search for Moringa and learn lots more about this miracle plant. My favorite source for Moringa products is the family owned and family run Moringa For Life farms in southern California.

Yes, papaya leaf has exceptional benefits.  But I want to know exactly where this product comes from.  Attempt to reach this company to ask this question have failed.Anyone out there know the answer to my quation:  Where is this papaya grown?

I've bought many types of reflective leashes: Most of them didn't meet my expectations because (a) when new, the leash was great at reflectivity, but soon the painted on reflective features wore off or peeled off too quickly w/ daily use; or, (b) only one side of the leash was reflective, so too often the leash wasn't effective in alerting  drivers to your presence; or, (c) leashes w/ reflective woven threads in the leash material didn't reflect brightly enough; plus, when this type of leash got covered in dirt/mud, it didn't reflect at all and had to be laundered thoroughly to become effectively reflective again.I ordered one of this Petflect reflective leash just to see how it would work. It's the best reflective leash I have, and I'm ordering three more.  I have two dogs so each dog will have an extra Petflect leash, just in case.There is another leash, by mfg Vedanta, that also has two sides of the leash with reflective material; one side is bright yellow, the other side is silver...however, that Vedanta leash on amazon.com costs $24.00 each, more than twice as expensive as the Petflect leash.Petflect makes a reflective harness also, but I haven't found one big enough to fit my Mastiff and large Amer. Staffie, both of whom have broad and deep chests.I may just buy ANSI rated, human type road crew reflective safety vests and refashion them to fit my two dogs.  I saw an online DIY on how to refashion a human sweater vest into a doggie sweater, so I'll just use the same instructions to fashion a human safety vest into a dog safety vest. You can find the DIY instructions by Googling "DIY Recycle Sweater for Dog".

No more rats or mice...not so much because of these traps, but because we adopted two indoor only kitties who are our 24/7 anti-rodent sentries.  These traps are a nuisance to bait and set (don't get your fingers in the wrong place and set them off...ouch).Best feature...they keep working and working and working, unlike the expensive electronic traps...I ordered three electronic traps recently and they all stopped working after only a couple of kills for each one.  I'd ordered electronic (battery run) RatZapper traps a few years ago when we had a problem and they lasted lots longer.  The newer ones on market today by the same brand apparently are sloppily built (Made in China), or built purposefully to become unusable after only a very short time.If you've got a rodent problem, get a whole bunch of these....Or, go to your local animal shelter or humane society and adopt a real live rat trap who is covered in soft fur, purrs when you pet him/her, wears long whiskers, demands breakfast by jumping on your chest in the morning, and loves you to pieces in return for a twice daily bowl of good kitty food, like Fussy Cat Tuna and Chicken dinner.

I did a lot of reading and research before settling on this particular brand's version for digestive enzymatic therapy. I've been taking it for about a month now and have noticed a real difference in improving my digestion.  I don't know whether a lowered appetite is an expected side result of taking this supplement. For me, cutting back on my appetite is an appreciated bonus since I want to keep my weight down at a reasonable level as I grow older and become more sedentary in my daily habits.Best result:  No more gassy bloated feeling and no more embarrassing gassy outbursts...noisesome or silent.  What a relief.I also eat a lot of organic Strauss Diary (local organic diary in Marin County, CA) yogurt and I up my intake of probiotics with Jarrow formulas Jarrowdophilus.Recommend supplementation with high quality enzymatic therapy and organic, high quality probiotics...keep me well...and digestively content.

My holistic veterinarian who keeps my pets in optimum health turned me onto this brand of multi vitamins.For myself, I order the version without iron because I am post-menopausal and don't need or want the extra iron in  my diet.My husband gets the version with iron because he needs it.My dogs get the non-iron version because dogs are super-sensitive to over dose of iron.This brand is more expensive than most.IMHO, this brand manufactures very high quality food supplements.You pay for what you get.

Heard this song totally by accident while browsing youtube.com. I start my day with this. Highly recommend this song as a nice, happy way to jump start your day. Down load it to your iPod so you can listen to it anytime.

Anthony Robbins is my premier go-to guru of how to live a valued, fulfilling life.In 1990, I read the first edition of his book, UNLIMITED POWER, which was first published in 1987. Then coincidentally, I saw an advertisement: Anthony Robbins was going to be conducting a seminar in San Jose, CA. I decided I just had to go.  No doubts; just that I had to go. I didn't have the cash on hand. So I put the charges for that seminar on my credit card and told myself I'd worry about paying it off after the seminar, which was advertised as a "firewalk experience".  If I could walk on fire, I would find a way to pay off my credit card. Our gross annual income at that time was barely $20,000 before taxes. It would be a stretch, but I was a believer.That seminar "Unleash The Power Within" was a life changing experience. My husband was swept up by my enthusiasm and contagious transformation after that. We maxed out our credit cards so we could both attend the longer, 8-day, more intensive, more intimate seminar, "Date With Destiny" at the L'Auberge Inn in Del Mar, CA. We were totally committed.We had maxed out our credit cards. Determinedly, we got creative in coming up with the necessary cash to pre-pay (required) for both of us to attend the "Mastery University" seminar in Kona, Hawaii which would be held a few weeks after our "Date With Destiny" seminar in Del Mar.The "Mastery University" firewalk on red hot coals in Kona was just over 40 feet long. We did it (my husband did it twice,and this was his first ever firewalk), no blisters or burns. One of the most amazing things was watching a paraplegic woman "walk" those 40 feet on her hands, her partner holding her legs in the wheelbarrow position, as they slowly made their way along the entire length of that fiery path, w/o any signs of blisters/burns on either of them. We also shimmied up a 55 ft telephone pole and stood on top (our feet barely fitting on the tip), then leaped off with outstretched arms to grab hold of a trapeze that swung towards us, just out of reach...so we really had to leap as far as possible to catch it. Total exhilarating adrenalin rush, especially since we had never done this before.It was during that 1991 "Mastery University" seminar in Kona, Hawaii, that Anthony Robbins was completing the first edition of his book, Awaken The Giant Within. I read that book as well, and I have read all the updated editions of his books, as well as reading, and listening to, and watching, anything else he's put out.  His TED talk is one of his shortest and best presentations.I've been to other seminars put on by motivational speakers. IMHO, none come close to matching the powerful and illuminating guidance of Anthony Robbins. He's the master. I'm forever grateful I picked up his first book Unlimited Power, out of curiosity. Everything happens for a reason.Anthony Robbins changed our lives in the most positive ways; ways we never even dared to describe, because they seemed so far out of reach.Read his books. Then find a means to participate in at least one of his incredible seminars. My recommendation is to do the firewalk seminar, "Unleash The Power Within". If you can walk on red hot coals (mind and emotion over matter), you can do anything you put your heart and mind into accomplishing.  I know.  We did it and are forever grateful for having done what appeared to be the "impossible".

Unique product from the 4-Star Emu Ranch in South East Kansas, USA: amazingly effective, fast acting pain relief. Goes on smoothly, leaves my skin soft, also smells good. Sure, it may seem expensive compared to other pain relief gels/creams, but look at all the ingredients listed below, then make your comparisons. For me and the relief it gives me, it's worth the price. I also trust this product because it's made in the USA. I've listed the INGREDIENTS below.When I've overexerted myself and strained my lower back and hips from a day of weed whacking and hauling garden trash, if I forget to apply this gel on myself (lower back, hips, thighs, knees), I can barely slide out of bed the next morning.  No problem.  I rub a bit of this gel on me where I feel really achey and I'm good to go. To enhance its effects, I suggest you also ingest the homeopathic pain relief formula, TRAUMEEL, manufactured by Heel, Inc. (a USA manufacturer).Made in USA TRAUMEEL comes in pill form (dissolve under the tongue) or in liquid form (place several drops under the tongue).

My current dog weighs 60 lbs: a muscular, wide chested & deep chested, Boxer-AmStaff mix. I am an unfit, unmuscular 100 lbs weakling. Dog has higher muscle-to-weight ratio than I could ever hope for.  Additionally, dog has unbeatable advantage of superior traction with four paws.Constant jerks & yanking on your dog's collar to make your dog stop pulling often results in permanent injury or collapse of your dog's trachea. This is why choke chains are no longer used by educated, humane dog owners & trainers who do not want to harm their dogs or have their dogs accidentally hanged by choke chain collars.Sense-ation harness (and similar harnesses sold by other manufacturers) is regularly recommended as one of the safest, most humane, easiest to put on and use, for dogs enrolled in training classes at my local humane society, Marin Humane Society in Novato, CA.  Please note: Marin Humane Society does not allow the use of choke chain collars on dogs in their shelter or in their training classes.  Marin Humane Society actively discourages the use of choke chain collars on any dogs.As a paying client-customer I regularly enroll myself and my dog in these dog training classes for the following reasons: (1) my dogs will not pull on the leash, (2) my dogs will become good citizens and pleasant companions to humans, (3) my dogs will be good will ambassadors for dogdom, and (4) I can learn how to be a responsible dog owner and caregiver to my dog.Because I also volunteer at Marin Humane Society as a dog training assistant, I have lots of practical experience in using this style no-pull harness. I regularly help clients in these classes learn how to put the harness on and how to use them to teach their dogs polite walking.  Owners quickly and effectively learn how to teach their dogs to calmly walk at their side without the need to keep pulling/yanking/jerking/popping on the dog's leash.You don't need to go to a training class to learn how effective this harness is. You can follow the instructions in the package to learn.  You can also watch youtube.com videos on how to use this harness to obtain quick positive results.When you purchase this style harness, please be sure to measure your dog correctly.  You do not want a harness that is so tight that it will cause undue pressure on the dog's rib cage, which may compromise his breathing. You also want a proper fit in order to avoid chafing/rubbing under the dog's front armpits. When you first begin, hook the dog's leash to two places: (1)to the front ring of this harness and (2) to the leash ring on the dog's flat collar. (Remember please...no choke chain collars).I purchase my Sense-ation type harnesses from the Marin Humane Society retail store, "Animal Outfitters", for about ten dollars less.  You can go to their website, "Marin Humane Society" for their store, "Animal Outfitters" and in this way, contribute to a good cause.Whatever price you pay, this style harness is worth every penny for the positive and satisfying results it brings to your dog and to you. You will soon be a relaxed, happy dog walker with an equally relaxed, happy dog that does not suffer a collapsed trachea or other injury from constant & frustrated jerking, yanking, & "pops" on the dog's neck.

On the Integrative Therapeutics Tyler website, you'll find information about the high quality ingredients in this supplement.  We (I, my husband, and our dogs), have been taking Multiplex-2 w/o Iron for several years. (We eat mostly organic foods and tons of veggies and fruits and grains...so we get adequate daily amounts of iron...as shown in our annual blood tests).I used to buy cheaper, off any nearby store shelf, products.  My holistic veterinarian, Pamela Bouchard, DVM, recommended this supplement for my dogs (it's easy to take the capsule apart and mix the powder into dog food).  Dr. Bouchard (who looks about 20 yrs younger, is robustly healthy, with perfect skin, shiny thick hair) also told me she'd done extensive research on multivitamins and decided this was the best...for herself...and for her dogs.  I followed her example and immediately saw and felt the difference after about two weeks of daily use. Clearer skin, healthier looking hair, nails that don't keep breaking/splitting, more energy.  This made a big difference in my dogs' health and physical appearance, as well as our own healthful well-being.The way I see it, you are what you ingest/put into your body. This is a lot cheaper than visits to my human doctor and to the dogs' vet.

This capsule maker works best when the air and weather is dry.  It doesn't work well during rainy season/humid weather.  I read through all the (mixed) reviews. Although every reviewer did not indicate the area of the country they live in, one thing became apparent: reviewers who live in arid or dry climates (e.g., Arizona, Texas, Nevada), are delighted with this gadget because they have no complaints about the capsules sticking or not coming out easily. In my case, I think the moisture in the air where I live (SF Bay Area) affects the gelatin capsules (which I keep with dessicant in a tightly closed glass jar), thereby resulting in capsules getting stuck in the capsule maker.  I'll just have to fill my capsules during the summer, when the weather is dry and the air has very low, or no humidity.

Kakadu Pet Explorer Nylon Fleece Reflective Dog Coat, 26", Sun (Yellow)This is the third Kakadu coat I've purchased through Amazon.com.  The first two coats were the two layer all polar fleece version...two layers of thick fleece. The third coat I bought was the raincoat: outside layer of waterproof material and inside layer of thick fleece. My Pit Bull girl loves wearing these. I bought coats that are a little longer than my dog's body in order to cover her tail and so that water drips off her backside without running down her legs. I especially like the ease of being able to adjust the neck opening and the wide belly covering. For this quality of construction and durability (my first two coats have lasted three seasons and still look like new), the price is super reasonable.

FYI. I am a woman who is not terribly handy with projects that require "average handyman" capabilities. I would give this Rat Zapper 5 stars if it weren't for the added and continuous expense and inconvenience of having to replace batteries to keep my Zappers at "kill" capacity. I searched the Internet for an electric corded rat trap and found none. My ideal rat trap would have capability of both batteries and AC corded power sources.I read through all the reviews for this Zapper and found one person who said he was able to save lots of money on batteries by converting his Zapper from battery power to plug in wall electric power.  A quick Internet search  came up with two easy and effective Youtube instructional videos.Browse Youtube. Search for "How To Convert A Battery Powered Device to Wall Power". Also search for "How To Do It: Basic Soldering". If you haven't soldered or worked with electric stuff before, strongly urge you to watch both videos before you start. BEFORE YOU BEGIN, get all the tools and equipment you will need:(1) small electric drill old fashioned Stanley manual drill; (2) Pencil Soldering Iron (30-40 Watts); (3) Rosin Core Solder, diameter .062; (3) 6 Volt Power Adapter (available from Radio Shack/Wallmart/Lowes or do a Google search to purchase online.SAFETY: Place your newly corded Zapper devices in places where your kids and pets cannot touch them.Additional Safety Measure: To be absolutely sure my dog and cats could not gain access to my Rat Zapper, I covered my Zapper with milk crate which I had wrapped in plastic bird mesh. I secured this mesh to the milk crate with Zip Ties. Buy cheap plastic milk crate, approximately 15" Long X 13.5" Wide X 10" High (The Container Store).  Get small Roll of plastic bird mesh from Home Depot/Lowes, or any garden supply store. Get package of various sized Zip Ties from Home Depot/Lowes/similar stores.Cut two lengths of plastic bird mesh: One piece will be 14"-15" wide X 36"-37" long; other piece will be 16"-17" wide X 34"-35" long. Leaving top of crate uncovered, secure one length of bird mesh to the front, bottom, and back sides of crate. Secure other length of mesh to other two sides and bottom of crate. The bottom of crate will have two layers of mesh. The top of crate will have no mesh.  Secure plastic bird mesh to the edges and the corners  and sides of the crate with Zip Ties.Final Step: Entry and exit for rodents to access the Zapper covered by the crate. Using scissors, cut two or three 2" X 2" openings in mesh on sides of crate near the top edge of crate (the side without any mesh).Place your Rat Zapper down. Turn your crate upside down, open side facing down. Cover the Zapper with milk crate. Pull/thread the cord from you converted Rat Zapper through the mesh.  Plug the cord to your newly electric powered Zapper into your wall outlet.Check your Zapper trap every single day...otherwise, you'll suffer the stench and mess of rotting, seeping, dead rodent (a clingy, thick, noxious stench that burrows into your furniture, clothes and hair).

As another one-star review states, the sizes for "Small" breeds (e.g., Chihuahuas, Yorkies) are too large. Additionally, there is no sizing for dogs with chests measuring larger than 26 inches around. The author states that the larger breeds "are less likely to wear sweaters". With that assumption, she summarily excludes sizes for the larger, deep-chested, or broad-chested, short haired dogs like Greyhounds, Weimeraners, Boxers, Great Danes, American Bulldogs, Am-Staff Terrers. I will have to look elsewhere to find patterns suitable for my 60+ lb, short-haired, rescued bully breed mix who shivers in 60-degree F temps. I thought I might be able to adjust a pattern, until on close reading, I discovered errors in the stitch counts. Don't waste your money on this poorly edited book.As for the comments of telling people to go to their local library to look up a book before purchasing it online, if that person ever ventured out of his/her little area of the world, he/she would discover not everyone in the big wide world has the luxury of having a library readily available within a reasonable distance. Also, not every library has the finances to include all the books listed for sale on Amazon.com.  Which is why so many people shop on Amazon to find stuff they can't find locally.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS. My rescued Pit Bull is a cautious dog who is intimidated and shy in new situations and among strangers. She's also fearful of loud noises (big trucks, thunder storms, etc.).To help my dog relax, in general and especially, in her dog training classes, my dog and I attended a TELLINGTON T-TOUCH Workshop where I learned how to "swaddle & wrap" my dog with an extra wide (4") ACE Bandage.  The Ace Bandage wrap worked exceptionally well, but I got tired of having to wrap and unwrap and also having to get new, clean Ace Bandages (the wide ones are quite expensive...and I needed three rolls). So, I decided to invest in this Anxiety Wrap shirt. It quickly paid for itself, plus I can wash it (cold water, hang up to dry) to keep it clean and fresh smelling.The Anxiety Wrap shirt makes a huge difference for my dog. She's much more willing to try new things in obedience classes. She's much more relaxed while working around other dogs and their people. The design of the Anxiety Wrap Shirt is such that the shirt applies gentle pressure on acupuncture points on the dog's body to help increase the dog's sense of security, like putting on a protective clothing or suit of armor before going into strange (and perhaps "dangerous" unfamilliar) territory.Additionally, the Anxiety Wrap helps the dog get a better sense of his body so he moves with more assurance. For example, in Dog Agility Training, dogs are put through exercises so they get a sense that they have to "collect" their bodies..their legs..to learn balance...and how to place their paws so they can handle the obstacles on the course.  This is very similar to training a horse in dressage in how to "collect" his body in order to place his hooves in the correct position to complete a training exercise.

These are by far one of my absolute favorite snacks! They are crisp and flavorful. They taste just like the Baked Lays Potato Chips-but without all the added junk! My kids absolutely love these too, so I have to keep an extra bag hidden in the house so I don't run out before having any! ;) This is one snack we don't get sick of and we have them at least 4 times a week if not more. They are also the perfect side for speidies or burgers and an on the go treat. I feel good knowing that I am eating and I'm feeding my kids something that is as healthy as these chips and we all enjoy them too! I love they're Gluten free and preservative free and that I can actually read every ingredient and know exactly what it is! Plan to keep these in the house as long as possible!*I tried this product free through @Influenster, but these opinions and views are 100% my own.

Oh my gosh! Salsa is so fun! Even better, with Learn to Dance Salsa it is also easy to learn. Each disk is a different skill level and it goes from easy to harder. The first disk shows step by step each move and learn basic stance and posture. By the end you are dancing basic routines that are easy to follow. By disk two you are learning more complicated moves. The beat is great and it really pushes you to learn the dance moves. I found it a little harder to follow, but I think I could have used more time with disk one. By disk three you should know basically what you are doing and it gets harder, the tempo gets faster-it's so fun! I think it would be more fun if I was any good at it!I love the music on the dvds and the step by step directions. This is definitely not a dvd set for someone just looking to fool around and recreationally dance the salsa. I say this because the way it is designed you will almost be forced to learn how to salsa. I love the extra feature on the dvds that give the history of the salsa and also teach about salsa etiquette. I really liked this set and was able to learn a new dance with my husband and have a great time with him. We had a blast learning the steps together and getting creative on the "dance floor" If you are looking to learn the salsa-I definitely recommend this set!

I absolutely love this hose! It fits in a small plastic tote or conveniently in a drawer yet when the water is turned on it expands to a whopping 100 feet! This is perfect because I am able to use it for so many things! I can water the garden in the back yard or I can wash my car in the front. (our spicket is close to the middle of the side of the house). It reaches both very easily. I love that it is snag proof. It didn't even get stuck in the rocks near the flower bed next to the house! I have been pretty rough on this hose-I'm not a gentle person at times and yet this hose has lasted!This hose is a blast to watch. It expands no matter what the water pressure is and when the water is shut off and the valve closed the hose shrinks back to it's original size. I couldn't believe how easy it was! It also never kinks or twists-it is the easiest hose to use! I hate traditional hoses because they are bulky, kink, and tangle so easily and they get stuck on just about anything. (okay-everything!) It's also super light-about two pounds. This makes it easy to move around and carry around the yard compared to those bulky hoses. Overall, this hose is a great value. It stands up to pressure (no puns intended), is easy to use, doesn't kink or tangle, and is a breeze to store. I plan to have this around for years to come. (and when this one kicks the bucket-I'll get a new one! :) )

I use these baking cups all the time. There are so many things to use them for! I love how non stick they really are. The first time I used them I still used non-stick spray in them, but after that I haven't since. I found they come out easily every time no matter what. For ease I occasionally use regular muffin pans and put the cups in them, but for quicker baking, I just line these up on a cookie sheet and bake that way. I find putting them in the muffin pans works best when making muffin sloppy joes or mini meatloaves while cupcakes and muffins bake best when placed on the cookie sheet in these awesome little baking cups. They come out light and fluffy and perfectly baked.These cups are great for jello and cheese cake as well-they come out so adorable and add spray whipped cream and a cherry on top and they look absolutely adorable! My daughter wanted me to use these for her birthday party and all her friends LOVED them! They are so colorful and cute. They are also super easy to clean. I just wipe them out when I'm done and they are good to go for the next time. Super easy and so convenient for those quick baking jobs. Oh-and they are great for baking brownies! You won't have to cut a brownie again when you bake them in these adorable little baking cups!

If you have two left feet and have ever wanted to learn Swing Dance, this DVD is for you. I am not by any means a great dancer. My favorite move involved rocking back in forth in a slow dance fashion with my husband. But when I found this DVD I just had to try it! It sounded so fun and since I could do it at home, there was no embarrassing classes to take where I risked being the only person who couldn't dance. This DVD got here super fast and I had to try it immediately.While my husband was not home at the time, it was okay because the way they break up the instruction they show the male and female dancers separately and then show them together. (so I could get some practice in before hubby got here! ;) ) It was incredibly easy to follow. They explained it step by step and showed each step from different angles so there was no missing a thing. My husband and I really liked the music on the DVD and how quickly we were able to pick up the dance moves on here to develop some form of technique. We try to practice with the DVD about once a week and plan to move on to another form of dance soon! Can't wait! :)

I really like the Oleavine Moisturizer. It came super fast and I feel like I started seeing results rather quickly as well. Within a week my skin looked more toned and smooth. My skin was feels so hydrated and soft! I absolutely love it! It works wonderfully on my sensitive skin and unlike some moisturizers, this one never made me break out at all. I really like that it is made with natural and organic ingredients so I don't feel bad about what I am using on my face and can feel confident in the product I am using.This moisturizer is especially great during the winter when the air is dry and my skin tends to be less hydrated and supple. The bottle it comes in is super cute and looks expensive while the product itself is actually quite affordable. I love the convenient pump top and that it only takes one pump to cover my whole face and neck meaning it will last quite a long time. I have noticed a real difference in my skin. It is more hydrated-especially for this time of year, the dark circles around my eyes are lightening up, and my fine lines are diminishing. My skin feels soft and smooth and my color is more toned and healthy looking. I really like this moisturizer overall and am so glad that I found it!

This Temperature gun is so multi-purpose. I use it when cooking and my husband uses it for the electrical and also when he is working on the house on different projects. It has really come in handy. While it depends how close you are holding it how accurate it is, it still gets it with in about three degrees making it rather accurate for being a non-contact temperature gun. This product came to me extremely fast. MeasuPro was really great about getting is sent promptly. It was exactly as described and worked right out of the package.I really liked the feature to turn on the laser pointer. My husband uses it much more than I do since I only really use this when cooking meat or in the kitchen, but the option to use it for accuracy etc. is great. It has a great grip on it. I really like how it feels in my hand. It is comfortable and I never feel it slip or sweat. It fits my husbands hand just as comfortably and I love that we both can use it without an issue or feeling like it doesn't fit in our hand correctly. The auto-shut off mode is great because I don't have to worry about wasting battery leaving it running for hours on end (accidentally) and hubby can just set it down and keep working and it'll shut off for him saving him time and energy.I find myself needing this all the time and when I don't need it, I often will just pick it up and play with it. It's so fun and simple to use. This tool is overall super easy to use and very worth the money. It comes with the battery needed to make it work and set up consists of putting the battery in and turning it on. It comes with easy to follow instructions if you want to change settings etc. and has a nice blue lit screen so reading it is a breeze. I really love this non-contact Termperature gun!

I absolutely LOVE this DVD. I wasn't sure what to expect since this was my first time with Pilates, but I found it to be both one of the hardest workouts I ever completed and one of the most relaxing at the same time. It is to me a mix between strength training and yoga. And I like it. A Lot. It starts by warming you up for the coming exercises with deep breathing, stretching, and a lot of mind focus. Then, it is followed by 24 different exercises that are specifically chosen with all the different skill levels in mind, though this is a DVD for beginners. Don't be fooled-some of these exercises look simple-and perhaps in execution they are-but they are effective as well. Each exercise targets a different body part/muscle group and really targets the muscles in a way you can feel it. Especially the next day. I couldn't believe how much my muscles ached after doing this workout-and I loved it! (you know-pain is weakness leaving the body!)I really liked the music used for this video and the step by step directions and different camera angles used. It was easy to follow and it really worked my body in a way I haven't made it work since I have had kids. I have gotten very slack in my fitness life and this DVD was just the thing I needed to "ease" my way back into it while attaining results, having fun, and getting sweaty. It is a great DVD for learners because it does give such great direction and I have really liked doing this every other night. (I also just started Insanity) I am really excited to see my results and toned body in a few months after I've used this a bit longer!

This is the best Pedometer I have ever used. It does so much for being so little! I love that while the screen shuts off, it is never truly off. I can sit down for a few minutes and the screen will shut off, but press the reset button and it turns on showing the accurate amount of steps taken and the time. On top of that, it records the amount of steps taken each day and resets each day so you can see how many steps you took that day. Despite it resetting each day, you can also press the mode button and see cumulative steps taken so if you want to keep track or have a set goal in mind for so many days etc. you can keep track of that as well.It comes with a convenient clip and also a detachable lanyard so it is super easy to keep on and is never in the way. It can be worn any way and still keep an accurate account of the steps taken. I have worn it so it is sideways, width wise, in my pocket, attached by the lanyard-every single way I have used it I have been able to track my steps accurately and am confident that I am never missing a step with this pedometer. It is also lighter than any other pedometer I have ever used. Some feel so heavy it's insane considering how small they tend to be.This pedometer is so multi-functional, I don't know how I ever used a different pedometer. It not only counts my steps, but also tracks calories and fat burned, the distance walked/ran, and my exercise time. I thas a built in timer, can record up to 1,000,000 steps for seven days (so you can track and write down weekly steps/progress) and has auto sleep so the screen is not always running wasting the battery. The fact it came with a second spare battery was awesome too! I have really loved using this pedometer so far. I have had it for a couple months and I wear it everywhere. It is so sleek and discreet no one ever notices it. I can set it to my stride and even if it's a little off the measurements come out fairly close to what I have actually done. Such as walk a mile and set it wrong it showed just less than a mile, fixed the setting and it recorded the full mile. It was accurate according to how I set it-that is what's important! I really love this pedometer and plan to use it for a long time to come.

I have really enjoyed using this Mastery system. I am not a dancer by any means-I have never taken a class that I was able to follow easily enough to pick up the steps and truly get it. This DVD set is definitely great for those on a tight budget who can't necessarily take a dance class or who need a skill touch up or to learn quickly before an event. I love that they show the steps at different angles and showing just the male and female dancers by themselves and also the couple together making it easy enough for a couple to learn their own steps separately and also together.The dance I liked the most was the Waltz because it has always intrigued me and seemed so romantic to me. It was fun learning the steps with my husband and spending that time with him doing something new that we've never tried before. Again, the steps were simple to follow thanks to the different angles and simple directions the DVD offered and we picked it up in no time. The set comes with 7 DVDs that teach the waltz, foxtrot, rumba, and also swing dance. I found the Swing dance extremely fun too-but we definitely did not pick up the steps quite as easily as those for the waltz....Partly due to the fact we are not exactly great dancers and I am also a pretty slower learner at times.I am definitely looking forward to learning the Rumba with my husband and having that fun time with him to learn something new as well as achieve some dancing skills. (I hope! ;) ) I love the music on these DVDs and the dance conversation in them as well and the fact that you can tell this program is specifically designed for beginners. It was the first program I have ever tried that has truly taught me steps and helped me learn the different dances without much difficulty. (minus the few times we tripped over each other...but I'm sure that's common-right? ) I can't wait to see how great we get and possibly get the next Mastery system and learn more dance moves we haven't tried before.

We love Terry Treetop books in our house! They always teach a good lesson and are colorful and fun. My daughter especially loves them because she can read them all by herself. This particular book is an absolute pleasure to read to my kids because it really teaches the importance of thinking of the environment and others.As Terry Treetop often does, he climbs a tree while on vacation with his family. He spots a group of dolphins and befriends the littlest one. He sees him learning new tricks and they are immediately intrigued and interested in each other. Unfortunately, Terry's new little dolphin friend ends up trapped in a net left in the ocean and Terry has to save him.This book teaches a great lesson about not littering and considering other creatures on our planet, and also thinking of others. This book says it is for k-3 or 3-8 years old and I think it is spot on! My daughter (6) loves to read this book on her own, but my sons 2.5 and 4 really enjoy reading this book with me as well and they are all eating it up and love the colorful illustrations. I really enjoyed reading this book to my children and love seeing my daughter read it on her own!

I have to admit, I never thought I would be reviewing a plunger. But when something is great, it has to be spoken about, especially when it is as affordable as this plunger is. I have used many plungers in my day. I mean, there is five of us in the house and it never ceases to amazing me how often we need to use this plunger.It gets even the largest and worse out..Just recently my son loaded the toilet with toilet paper and plugged very well-and there is no way I'm putting my hand in the toilet....I used this plunger with the bottom rubber out and it plunged it with no problem at all. The toilet was unplugged in less than two minutes. I love that it is easier to use this plunger than most, but it isn't too "soft". It is sturdy, but the rubber isn't so hard it hurts to plunge. I love that the handle is plastic. I can't count the amount of times a wooden handle has given me a splinter-plus when the water splashes back up, I'm always worried about what is left in those wooden handles. It is so gross. With this plunger I can wash the handle and feel confident I am not touching old toilet water. It is a great plunger!

Abigail and the Sahara Adventure is a great book for pre-schoolers and young readers. I really enjoyed reading this to my kids and they loved it too. My daughter is also a young reader and was able to read this book almost all by herself, so that was really cool. This book is a magical adventure that kids are bound to love. It starts out with a magic bike, special words to travel anywhere, and a trip to the Sahara!In this adventure she makes new friends, receives gifts from a sweet little girl, and tells her Grandma of all her adventures. Will anyone believe her magical story? My kids and I enjoy reading about all her grand adventures. It gets their imaginations flowing and it is fun to read, talk, and laugh with them. I enjoyed seeing my daughter reading this on her own and the way she lit up when she realized she had done it all on her own. It is a colorful and fun book. It takes kids on their own magical adventures and I've caught my kids pretending to be just like Abigail and imagine their own fun adventures to far places. A really great children's ebook!

This colon cleanse works great! I have a problem with irregularity and water retention and those things make it difficult to lose weight. I found this colon cleanse and decided to give it a try. I tried this the day after I got it and it was easy to take. I started out taking two because I wasn't sure how well it would work-but I definitely could have stuck to just taking one. I spent a lot of time in the bathroom that day, boy, did it really clean out my system!I continued to use this cleanse for two weeks, just one pill a day in the morning, and I am very happy with my results. I lost five pounds in water weight alone, became more regular, experienced less gas, had more energy, and felt just overall more healthy. I really like that other than the first day when I took two pills instead of one, I haven't had any side effects or issues. I do take a week long break every two weeks just to give myself a break, but I don't really need to. It is the perfect addition to my nightly routine and I like the feel of regular.  This is the best cleanse I have used thus far!

This Diaper bag/stroller organizer is extremely handy and works great for what I need it for. I have three kids under six and they all seem to come with their amount of needs and since I only use an umbrella stroller for them, it can be extremely difficult to find a place to store things when we go shopping. I found this stroller bag and had to try it. This bag is extremely convenient. The two clips on either side make it the perfect bag for the umbrella stroller because they can tighten up a little and the bag never drags. (this is great because often bags drag and it defeats the purpose)The larger pocket of this is perfect for diapers, a change of clothing, snacks, keys, or even a small shopping bag if needed. There is also a spot that conveniently holds my cell phone so it's always within reach. (plus, with it in front of me, the worry it'll get picked is much less) There is a closed pocket that is great for holding a small wallet or cash, this frees my arm up because I don't have to carry a purse around at all. I also like the side cupholders because then I always have a drink available for the kids. This bag is also great for road trips, I fill it with snacks and a couple diapers and road sickness pills and set it right between the front seats of the car.  This bag is sturdy, cute, and very convenient.

I absolutely love Total Recoil Kinesio Tape. I have been curious about this stuff for a really long time, but was hesitant to try it for several reasons. The first is I have very sensitive skin. I was afraid any adhesive would really bother my skin and cause problems for me. I was happily surprised to find that I was not at all sensitive to this tape. It didn't itch while I wore it and it also didn't leave my skin red when I took it off.The second reason I was hesitant to use this is because I really just felt it was likely just another fad. I mean they come in and go out in a matter of days most often. But after trying this kinesio tape, I found I was sorely wrong. I suffer from terrible shin splints and runners knee making it hard to get back in shape or stay active. I used this tape on my shins and around my knee and felt an instant tingle. I can't really explain what it was, but it felt like my muscles and shins were relaxing and I found I was able to really push through and get my run in and feel great during and after.The third reason I didn't try it is because I expected it to be pretty expensive. What I realized after finding this kinesio tape is that it doesn't have to be! At only $12.99 a roll, this kinesio tape is very affordable. The roll lasts quite a while because it gets cut into strips while being applied, so one strip my actually be used three or four different ways width wise making it last much longer. It has great elasticity and it goes on easily . I can reposition it if I mess it up a little (only a couple times-don't over do it, it isn't duct tape!) and it sticks well. This tape stays on through rain, sweat, rubbing-it comes off when I want it to come off and not a moment more. I have to admit-It hurt removing it more while I was still a little sweaty than after letting it dry off-so I recommend doing that because it won't pull as much...Great for just about any area and any sport or physical activity, this tape has great quality, and being able to run again makes it definitely worth stocking up on!

I have used many True Synergy products, so when I was offered the opportunity to try this for my honest review, it was an easy decision for me. I received this and started taking it immediately. I often suffer from knee and joint pain and get achy pretty easily at times. I had to take this for about a week for it to start working, but most supplements take at least three days to really enter the blood stream and up to thirty to feel full effects. I am very happy with my results.Since adding this to my morning routine, my knees and joints have felt so much better. I rarely have a flare up anymore. I really love that this is in pill form. I am not a huge turmeric fan as far as taste and this really saves me from having to taste it and I still gain results. It isn't just great for my joints and swelling, but I also love that my stomach feels so much better. I am very sensitive to certain foods, so the fact I can now have them without the nasty side effects because my GI is working so much more efficiently is great! I really like this product overall and while it doesn't offer immediate results, it offer results and that is what is important. Definitely worth taking if you have inflammation problems or tummy issues.

Origins by Luxurience is just what my face has been asking for. It is as luxurious as it sounds and leaves my face feeling pampered and beautiful. This particular cream is great for my skin because I have very sensitive skin and this cream is hypo-allergenic. It has a light scent that I wouldn't really describe as girly, so anyone could use it really if they wanted to. It is thick and creamy, but goes on feeling light and airy. My skin feels soft and smooth after applying this cream and I love how bright my face is now beginning to look after a few weeks of using it.I had dark circles around my eyes and they are starting to disappear and my skin is hydrated and healthy for this time of year. Often my skin is left feeling dry and itchy during the cold months, especially in years like this where the weather goes from bearably cool to freezing cold within a few days, or even hours. My skin feels and looks genuinely rejuvenated when I use this cream and it seems my tone is evening out. I use this cream twice a day and it has done wonders for my face and confidence. This is a very good cream and I definitely plan to buy more when I am close to running out. (it takes very little to cover my face, so it lasts a while from what I can tell so far)

If you have never used a peel before, this is the one to use! I've been given other peels for gifts before and they really didn't do the job, but this peel really works wonders! I do recommend you make sure you do it on a day you aren't going out at all or at night before bed so your face has a chance to recover a little before entering civilization again, but really, that's normal. I have seen people spend thousands of dollars on chemical peels, and they really don't have to do that! Dr. Song's Lactic Acid Gel Peel works just like any professional peel and you can do it in the comfort of your own home!This peel has worked to get rid of old acne scars and marks on my face and my skin tone is more even and pores seem smaller. My skin is bright and healthy. It is super easy to use, just take a cotton ball and spread it over the face being careful not to layer over what has already been covered (that will make it peel more). It took a couple of uses and healing times to see any real results, but that is also normal since the healing is what helps restore and renew the facial skin. My skin is much more healthy looking and my freckles are even beginning to lighten. I just love how my skin looks after using this peel.

My friend introduced me to the issues that eating foods with gluten and soy in them could be and I decided to try a new way of eating. One area I always struggled, though, was with my soy sauce. I LOVE it-can't get enough even. Coconut Secret has been great and it has gotten me off my soy sauce "kick" because, I have to admit-I like it even MORE than I ever did soy sauce. (and it's way healthier for me too)My only complaint about this product is it's spout is a bit messy. It can be pretty messy, so I ended up going out and getting a special oil bottle with a spout that is "chef quality" (or looks it at least!) and put my Coconut Aminos sauce in that instead fixing that problem. I only wish I hadn't needed to go buy a "special" bottle for it to avoid mess.This sauce tastes very good and is great in different recipes such as stir fry, over rice, meat recipes, and as a side "dip" for certain dishes. I like that it is sweeter than typical soy, because I have somewhat of a sweet tooth and it curbs that desire at meal time by being the sweet I need. If this product were to just get better packaging so that it wasn't messy and didn't spill, it would get five stars from me!

Finally, a beanie that provides warmth and protection from the elements ALL AROUND your head. I was so excited to receive a sample of this product at no cost for reviewing purposes. As soon as I opened up the package, I could immediately feel that this was made of very nice, high quality, warm materials. I ran my fingers over the fabric, noticed it was made of fleece, and instantly felt how cozy it was. What I liked about this Balaclava Ski Mask, is that it's got a ton of room. It covers your entire head, pulls forward passed your face, and has bungee cords to pull on to close off the opening. This secures your warmth, and doesn't allow for any wind to get inside. AWESOME. The front of the mask has a portion that covers your mouth, and even nose if necessary. This is a rare thing to find in other beanie like products. This does not have huge Velcro straps to close the mouth part, it's just sewn into the Balaclava. It is so warm, and provides the ultimate protection against all cold weather elements. Your face is fully protected. The bottom part of this ski mask, is really long, and fits on top of your shoulders perfectly, providing so much warmth to your throat and neck. The weather is currently dropping in my area. I am so excited that for the first time in all my life, I have finally encountered a product that will provide the warmth and protection I have always wanted. I love the quality, and the durability of this product. It's something I can not recommend enough. For those living up north, or in any area that is really cold. This would be perfect for you. Do not leave your home without it.

This is the cutest Handy Man Childrens Toy around. The quality of the work bench and all the tools that come with it, are really good. The entire set proved to be quite durable, with the exception of one of the yellow side pieces. I had trouble fixing it into the side, so it broke, but honestly it doesn't need it. It's just a piece to place tools in, but doesn't harm the overall functionality of the product.This set is quite adorable, and comes with everything your little man (or little lady) needs to build, and play. The possibilities are endless with these tools. What I loved most was that once your little one is done playing with this toy, you can remove all the attachments, and place them back inside the box. After closing the snap on the box, it doubles as a step stool, which is perfect, because I actually needed a step stool for my little one to brush her teeth. This step stool can also be used to sit on, and comes with a carrying handle affixed to the top. Overall, this toy really has and does it all. It's an all in one toy, with tools, storage, sitting, stepping, and carrying. Very functional, very durable, and extremely cute! Highly recommend it.Sample product was sent at no cost in exchange for an honest review.

Definitely one of the better selfie sticks I've used. The quality and build just feels far superior, and holds my phone in nicely. I really like that this selfie stick connected to my phones bluetooth really quickly. I was able to find the selfie stick almost immediately, and got it paired. The response of the button to take pictures works rapidly. It takes the pictures automatically, and does not lag at all. I love the look and the feel of this selfie stick, and think this will absolutely be one that will stand the test of time. You do not get better quality selfie sticks, than this. I recommend it.Sample was sent for reviewing purposes at no cost. All opinions are my own.

Sentey does it again. I am loving my Headphones with Microphone set. It has such a booming, high quality sound that you can't get from too many headsets. These are extremely comfortable, and adjust to the size of any head easily. They are a comfortable fit, and sit on your head so perfectly, that they don't move around or fall off.I love that these can be folded to fit into a case very compactly. They are easy to unfold and set up, and easy to fold and put up too. The cushion that fits around your ears is really comfortable too. It is made of a high quality padded material, that doesn't overheat on your ears. It's comfortable enough to wear for long periods of time.Overall, the sound quality, and the design are pretty awesome. They are holding up REALLY REALLY well, and they fit really nicely. I love that all noise is being drowned out, and I can easily answer a phone call while using the headset. The audio coming in and going out sounds really nice, as does the set as a whole. I would definitely recommend these. I'm getting tons of use out of them.Sample was sent for reviewing purposes at no cost.

This is one awesome, and unique beanie! I am so in love with it, that I'm thinking of taking it from my hubby for myself. I received the Navy Blue with Gray designs. It's Gorgeous, and definitely something both men and women can use. The quality of this beanie, is amazing. It is sewn perfectly Every stitch, to every knit, it's all of the highest quality you can imagine. The inside has a super soft fuzzy liner, that gives the warmest feel you could want during these brutal winter months. I have never seen a beanie quite like this, and I honestly can not wait for the weather to drop, so that I can get lots of use out of it.The size of the beanie is wonderful too. It has a lot of stretching room, so all size heads would fit in it. I love that there's a lot of room inside too, so you can have a bit of a slouch look at the top of the head which is what I love. It is SO comfortable to wear, and feels very cozy. I can not get over this amazing beanie. It has so much room, so much stretch, and it is by far the warmest beanie I have ever tried. I will be fighting my hubby to see who gets to wear it, because we both love it so very much. I highly recommend it. You will not be disappointed.

These are going to be fantastic for all the Holiday baking we're going to be doing in the next month. The rubber outside, has grooves that make it so easy to grip any pans, whether they be glass or metal. They have a non-slip grip, so even if your pans are wet, or maybe have grease dripping on them, these are going to work wonderfully to pull anything out of the oven.The cotton lining on the inside just makes it so much easier to hold onto any hot items. There is no transfer of heat when you're holding something hot. I have been able to hold on to baking dishes that are right out of the oven without needing to put them down immediately. This is actually a safer way to transfer from the oven to whatever surface you're placing your hot dishes on. I love the cotton. My favorite thing though, would have to be that the cotton extends passed the rubber glove, to give you added protection from heat. I can't tell you how many times the tops of my arms, near the fold of my elbows touch the top of the inside of the oven. I have burn marks in that area because of how clumsy I can be. Not anymore though. These have extra cotton that comes up far enough to protect your arms from heat. I'd say they have an extra 4 inches of fabric, which makes a huge difference when you're cooking.These gloves are fantastic, they are super durable, very high quality, and can withstand some extreme heat. I highly recommend them, especially since the Holiday's are coming. Any cooks, bakers, BBQ makers, you will all benefit from these Silicone Oven Mitts. They're absolutely fantastic.

Well, there are a few good and bad things about this case. First of all, it does provide great protection. The case is quite durable, and I feel my ipad is secure at all times. The clasp that closes the lid though isn't too strong. I'm afraid to press on it too hard, cause I don't want to snap it off. I think it could be bigger or longer, to provide a better snap. The keys work wonderfully. They responds really well, and you can feel them as you press them. It's SO much easier to use that keyboard vs. the on screen keyboard for sure. I have never used a keyboard this strong. Not only that, but it paired with my iPad super quickly, which is awesome. The biggest issue I had with this case, was that there is absolutely no way to use the iPad when it's in a vertical position. The ipad WILL fall over, so it does not work at in portrait mode. The iPad is entirely too heavy, and the grooves to hold up the iPad do not hold it at all. I would suggest the grooves be deeper, but that wouldn't help because as I said, the iPad is too heavy. The other issue I had was that you can tilt the screen back. It's almost at a 90 degree angle whether it's on the first groove or the second. The grooves are not far apart enough to make a big difference in the angle of the iPad, so it doesn't really matter much which one you use. All cut outs are in the perfect place. You can get to every button easily. Nothing is blocked. I loved that the iPad settings such as volume, brightness and dimming can all be adjusted through the keyboard. Almost like a computer or laptop. Neat fully functional Features.So angle, portrait mode, and the snap closure could use some updating, but the keyboard, and the ability to connect work really well. I have yet tofind a keyboard that works as well as this one. With a few updates, this would be an awesome case.

I'm extremely impressed with this light bulb. I honestly had no idea that a smart light bulb even existed. I knew right away to look for the Sunlabz app on my phone. I'm on an android, and found it right away. I plugged in my light bulb, turned it on,  turned on my Bluetooth, and through the app, connected directly to the bulb. Super easy to do. There are several different features on the bulb. The standard light can be changed from a cool tone to a warmer toned light, as well as dimming it, and brightening it too. At the top of the app, you can switch the bulb to "color spectrum" Here you find a color wheel, where you can select your color of choice. This part also has the bright and dim feature. Under neath the brightening settings, is a mode selector. You have the option to have the colors of the light switch from color to color. I absolutely love this feature, as there seems to be such a vast amount of different hues per color. Reds, Pinks, Aquas, Blues, Greens, Yellows, Purples, so many different varieties of these colors, and they're all gorgeous.The only minor negative issue I've seen with this bulb, is that the app has to find the bulb each time you turn it on. Even if you leave the light on for a while, and go back to the app to turn off the light, you have to kill the app completely, and reconnect in order to mess with the light through the app. It's not a big deal when the light is extremely nice. But it can be a bit of a hassle if you're in a hurry. It's a slight inconvenience. Other than that, this light bulb is pretty neat. I'm super thrilled to turn it on in my living room every night. Especially during a movie, it's super neat. With over 16 million colors, and a lifespan of 15,000 hours, this light will last for a very long time, and be loved by all. I do recommend it.Product was sent at no cost for reviewing purposes.

I finally had a chance to step out and trim some hedges with these Pruning shears. It's been a rainy week here in Texas, so I wasn't able to try them sooner. All good things come to those who wait I suppose, cause once I was able to put these to use, I was pleasantly surprised.Out of the package, the pruning shears, seem like a solid set. They are very sturdy, easy to grip, and have nice bit to them when you open and close the grips. You can hear the blades rub on each other creating that nice sound they make, which shows me they're going to cut through branches and twigs nicely. The handles have a nice rubber grip on the outside. They make it easy for them to stay in my hands, and not slip. I love that they have a safety lock, so that when they are not in use, you can lock them closed, and avoid anyone grabbing them or hurting themselves. The blades are stainless steel. So I would suggest just washing them with a wash cloth, and patting them dry, so they do not rust. They are super sharp, so do not attempt to touch the blades.Once I stepped outside, I put them to use immediately. I was so surprised at how well they cut through my shrubs. It was so nice not having to open and close the grips repeatedly to get a good cut. These were a one snip deal, and cut my trim time in half. I'm always left outside snipping and snipping over and over, but these did the trick quickly, and I was back inside in no time.I can not stress enough how nice a pair like these are. They works really well, and feel really nice in my hands. My hands are not big. They're average-to-small sized hands. Other women have larger hands than I do, and these still felt really comfortable in my hands. I had no trouble gripping them and using them. So I know they'd work well for both men with larger hands and women with smaller hands. I highly recommend these. I won't be doing any gardening without them anymore.Sample was sent at no cost for reviewing purposes.

I am so excited that this product has come into my life.  At a 150 lbs. capacity, it makes it perfect for what I'm hauling. I was surprised at how flat the package was that it came in. This made me realize just how compact this product is to store. I opened up the package, and quickly figured out how to set up the trolley. It was so easy! All I did was press both handles together to extend the neck, use my foot with shoes to step on the base plate and push it down. This triggered the tires to open up, and I was all set to go. The aluminum body is really very sturdy. I was actually quite impressed  with how well it was constructed, and how strong it felt. The wheels are thick rubber, which makes it so easy to push around on dirt, and over rocks, as I've done. The base plate is not too large, but it's large enough to transport large boxes, and even boxes with a ton of weight are easy to set on plate. I also love that if my boxes are moving around, this trolley does come with a bungee cord, to help me tie them down.When I'm done moving boxes around, I just press on the handles again, kick the base plate up, which will fold the wheels back in, and it's back to it's super compact, super thin size. I can slip this between my wall and refrigerator, or between my washer/dryer and the wall, anywhere where there is a gap, this thing is sure to fit. It's so slim that it takes almost zero space anywhere you store it. I can not get over how awesome this product is. This is super handy, and super sturdy. You will not regret this purchase.I received this product free, for an honest review.
I received a small air package from china, written in Chinese with nothing in it. Do not order this product.

I have a dog who is a ONE person owner and has major trust issues, so I bought this for that reason.... I actually need to leave this on my dog when someone is dog sitting him so they can take him out.  IF they try to leash him by the collar he will snip.... so this has been my saving grace. This is sturdy, clips nicely, and is a perfect length if someone else in the world has a dog issue like mine.  I see this product holding up well.

I have tried MANY hair thermal products: Paul Mitchell, Redkin, Aquage.... and out of them all this HSI is my favorite and then probably Aquage. This does NOT make your hair dry or sticky.  It makes your hair smooth, SUPER soft (almost too soft if that's an issue), and smells beautiful.  I have A LOT of hair and it's thick.  I cannot believe how much this thins my hair out (in a good way) when I straighten it.  I feel like my hair looks like Jennifer Aniston's and that's what I mean by it's almost too soft, but that is not a bad thing! I'm not use to it, but I like it! I have tried this on wet hair and then blow dried and also just on dry hair and then a straighter to it and it works great both ways.  I'm not sure which stores sell this product, but I definitely plan to put it in a beauty basket as a Christmas gift for my best friend that I'll make.  Definitely my new favorite thermal product and I'm sooooooo glad I found it.  Redkin and Paul Mitchell just made my hair....dry and sticky almost like a dry shampoo was in it. Ladies, do not hesitate to buy this product. Also, it says it protects 450 degrees which is great since my hair straightener goes up to 400 degrees.

After throwing away my militaryshield  protector since i ruined it after one try,  i decided. .there has to be a hard plastic cover for the edge that is not a wet application.  Thanks to previous buyers who answered my questions,  they convinced me to drop the money on this protector and I'm glad i did.  The instructions are not in English,  but you could easily figure it out.  Wipe screen with dust cloth, use sticker on screen to get additional dust,  then apply protector pulling off sticker backing. This was easy to apply and the were absolutely no air bubbles.  It covers the edges of the phone and most of all,  sticks with staying power. I was even able to put my caseology case on right away.  My screen is fully protected and it still responds to my finger on the screen, but it does take a few taps on buttons near edge part with protector on thus one loss of star.  Finally,  someone who mastered the edge with full,  hard,  protection.  I'm not sure if it's the glass,  but it sure feels like it. Photo to come.

Item as pictured.  It is glittery, but not obnoxious. Loss of one star since you need to bend it to tighten and take off and it bent out of shape, in a pointy matter.... for the price...i can see a couple of months wear.

This is by far the best cover for the kindle fire. only complaint is the little magnet is kinda pointless (on inside closure) because it moves. i ended up just throwing it away because i dropped it before and was scared my dog ate it. it's not really needed. love the case, have had it for over a year and it is still holding up in color and edges (no signs of wear and tear)
had this on my s4 for 2 years and it has protected it well. i finally upgraded to the s6 edge and went with caseology again. they give slim designs, cute designs, and protection all in one.
perfect little humidifier for my bedroom to keep on my night stand. no complaints and not much else to say! i love how it automatically turns off too.

had my phone for a week and i never drop my phones and somehow i magically dropped my new phone with this case on and NO protector yet. it survived, thank god. i was super nervous. my old S4 had a caseology case and i bought my mom one too and we've been happy with the skinny case (no extra bulk) but still cute and protected. This is why I ordered from them again. i went with the clear because my gold/chrome phone is too cool to hide.... my only complaint is that the back has an air bubble/air pocket showing.... kinda lame... but for the price i paid, i can't complain. it definitely reveals the edge of the phone too, that isn't fully covered, but still protected enough. i'll always pick caseology cases over otterbox. cheaper, slimmer, and cuter cases. LOVE the gold edges on the case.

waste of money! i watched the video and i read the top reviews suggestions. i followed it perfectly, but when it came to squeegeeing the excess liquid out i saw a black dot under the protector and it was driving me nuts. it was part of the black cloth or something.... i did this in a humid bathroom after a shower, so if it was dust, then that sucks. i couldn't get the black dot off the protector and when i tried to it completely got worse. i was so frustrated i just threw it in the trash. it didn't cling to the edges well, but i didn't get to the blow dryer phase. guess ill suck it up...spend the $23 to get the plastic dry application that had great reviews instead.... ALSO, very nerving to apply liquid to a brand new expensive phone and yeah yeah blah blah...wet is the only way to do it with the edges...don 't care! it was still terrifying...

I was desperate for a black clutch for a wedding and didn't want to break the bank. Normally,  i feel this clutch is too big and flat looking,  but it seemed to go with my vintage look i was going for.  Decided to keep it,  but I'm  not sure when I'll use it again.  Price was right.  Also, a heads up...there's a clear sticker over the gold portion.  I thought my gold metal part was scratched upon arrival , but luckily it was the sticker!

This is an..understatement necklace.  Must have missed the measurements as it was not as big as i wanted (this is a personal preference.  Many of you will like the size and a picture is shown). However, i am returning it due to the poor chain. If i had a replacement chain then i might have kept it.  It constantly twists when wearing it and i had it on for two minutes.  Too noticeable to wear.... if these two things won't bother you then it's cute for the price. I can get better jewelry at forever21 though.

I am NOT a handy girl, but I was proud of myself for being able to put this together on my own in less than 20 minutes. My dog gets hot, a lot... And it's funny because he's small, but he loves winter. My bedroom is the hottest room in the house, so I figured he'd like this since he lays on the wooden floor in the kitchen. We'll see if he continues to use it...I just introduced it to him today with his toy and blanket as a pillow. I don't plan to cover this with a blanket because this defeats the cooling purpose which is what he needs. I got a medium...which is kinda big for my dog, but he thinks he's big and I figured he'd like the space. I like the gray color much better than that advertised green. Huge huge box that it was shipped in, not necessary Amazon... LolUpdate: my dog doesn't use this as hoped... Every time I get him on it he doesn't stay... He sleeps on the wood floor when hot, so surprised he doesn't like this.... No sense in returning it as one day I'll have another dog to keep mine company. My little guy previews the fabric dog beds or his crate. Bummer.

While this fit true to size and the print is gorgeous and the color..there's a random stitch in the center of the waist and it's SO noticeable AND it doesn't line up with the pleat. It is gorgeous from a side view, but makes me look bigger in the hips than I am, but that's to be expected with the flare pleat. I haven't decided if I'm keeping this yet as it's for a wedding and that center stitch can't be hidden unless I safety pin a bow. There's also a center stitch in the middle of the skirt in front all the way down that's not a pleat.... But I figured that wouldn't be too noticeable. Maybe in black the stitching isn't obvious.. Makes me look heavy...so... I dunno..guess super skinny girls can rock this. I'm just average in weight. My phone camera is awful, but the close up reveals the bright red.

What a deal! I figured the watch would be a fake at the price this was selling at. However, it passed every test to determine it's real. Plus with free returns, if it was fake, I'd send it back! I'm happy with my purchase. Its extra links came on the watch as it is very large upon receiving and links will need to be taken out. Gorgeous and I can't wait to wear it!!

This is my first Anne Klein purse, but I own her pea coat and flats. I'm again, impressed with Anne Klein and will continue to buy her products. I bought the hazel purse and it's gorgeous. Of course it went on sale after I bought it, gggrrrr, but I still love it. Item arrived in perfect condition and it's a nice size to use everyday.
