Those weren't very appealing to me. I kept looking days later and came across this case on Amazon. It fits the phone perfectly!!! And the way that the stand works makes it an UNBEATABLE CASE!!!!! All you have to do is push your finger on the little square that's on the back of the stand & it pops right out. Then push it up to pop back in place. It's soooooo cool. If you're looking for a great case with a stand, look no further...This is a must have!!!
I watched this movie when it first came out. I laughed so hard, tears were pouring out my eyes. Since then I may catch it on TV and still laugh to this day. Great movie. Part 2 isn't as good as this.

This case is very lightweight. The leather feels nice and soft. I purchased the white case to match the white Samsung Galaxy. So far, so good.I haven't used the screen protector or cleaning cloths yet because I purchased a mirror protector separately.

I'm glad I borrowed this book from my local library instead of purchasing it.  The wording in this book was difficult to grasp and the practice test did not match the actual exam.  I'm not sure what type of information was used to put this guide together as it wasn't much of a big help.  Thankfully I still passed the test with lots of luck and good guessing for the most part.

I've been trying all kinds of different hair care products for the past several months.  Then I finally decided to give Carol's Daughter a try.  I absolutely love the Black Vanilla Conditioner.  It does wonders for my hair.  But I was still looking for a deep conditioner.  I would buy other products (Mizani, ORS, etc.) online and in beauty stores, but they dried out my scalp, tangled and/or weighed my hair down heavily.  What a waste of money for products I don't plan on using ever again.  I have no idea why I didn't try this Black Vanilla Smoothie in the first place!  This smoothie does EXACTLY what it says.  After sitting under the dryer for 15 to 20 minutes, it detangles and makes my hair bouncy, shiny, and moisturized.  Since using this smoothie, I've been getting compliments on how healthy my hair has been looking.  So the search is finally over!  I will continue to use this as my one and only deep conditioner.

Don't want to get into too much detail for my reasons on trying this tea.  I was searching the net looking for some sort of laxative that didn't last long and easy to take.  A pill form wasn't an option.  This tea seemed to be a good alternative for me because I drink tea almost every night.  I made sure to try this over the weekend just in case I needed quick access to a bathroom.  And I'm glad I did.  The next morning, let's just say I went with ease a few times.  I found this on sale at a local store and bought 2 boxes.  I gave it 4 stars only because I did have some painful cramping throughout the day before/during the multiple trips to the bathroom. But overall, it seems to do what it claims.  So if you're looking for a short lasting, easy to take laxative; give this tea a try.

Before purchasing this CD, I read some of the reviews and was a bit puzzled by the song remix comments.  In my head I was trying to figure out what remixes???  I skimmed through the playlist online but I never played the clips.  So I'm thinking there are no remixes to those songs.  Anywho, I decided to go ahead and purchase it anyway to start a Whitney collection.  Got the CD in the mail a couple of days ago but didn't listen to it until today.  Played disc 1 & was happily singing with Whitney, all the while wondering where were the remixes that people commented about.  Then I popped in disc 2 & to my dismay, I did not recognize the beats behind the hits!!!!!  I was totally shocked & disappointed!!  I was so sure that the reviewers were mistaken or received the wrong CD, but that was not the case.  I hate the way they remixed those songs.  The originals were hits & definitely didn't need to be remade with this foolishness.  Now, I have to literally find/pay for the original version of those 18 songs to remake disc 2!! What a waste!

I was really hoping this would be a good deep conditioning treatment, especially for protein purposes.  But, no such luck.  Used it after my wash and sat under a dryer for about 20 mins.  After rinsing, it wasn't all that good of a detangler.  My hair wasn't very difficult to comb while wet, but there was some snagging.  After roller setting & drying, my hair was VERY HEAVY.  There was no bounce in my hair, it's absolutely flat & blah.  Wrapping my hair took more effort than it should.  Since it's so weighed down, my hair doesn't even keep the shape.  To the touch, it almost feels like I heavily greased my hair with vaseline.  With that said, I'm still on the hunt for a good protein deep conditioner that doesn't weigh my hair down or feel greasy.

Several weeks ago, I tried the unsweetened version to this instant ginger tea & loved it.  I was in a local food market looking to purchase more of the unsweetened tea when I found this.  I tried it for the first time a couple days ago and it works just the same! Only difference is I don't need to add any sugar.  This sweetened ginger tea has the perfect amount of sugar needed.  It's not too sweet nor too bland, it's just right!  Also, the strength of this tea is great just like the unsweetened version.  The strong flavor/taste of ginger definitely comes through.  My only wish is that Caribbean Dreams would put more sachets in the box!  I love to drink big cups of tea and 10 just isn't enough when I like to use 2 at a time.  I will continue to repurchase this or the unsweetened version, whichever I can find locally.  I prefer this much more than the ginger tea bags, so I'm willing to overlook the amount sold in the boxes.

I've been using the Ultra Moisture Body Wash with Shea Butter for a couple of years.  After a while I think my skin got used to it.  So I searched Olay.com looking for other moisturizing body washes and found this.  I liked the idea of the Body Butter Ribbons and decided to give it a try.  I LOVE IT!  It's very thick and lathers really well.  The scent is strong but not overpowering.  Plus, it makes my skin feel clean & moisturized.  Will definitely purchase again (from local department store because it's a little cheaper).  I also use the Quench In Shower lotion with this body wash.  It's great combination!

This in shower lotion is a dream come true!  I've always hated applying lotion on my skin after a shower.  Partly because I was just lazy to do it.  But my skin has suffered from that neglect by being dry and itchy...especially during the winter months.  I've been using Olay Body Wash for years now & was looking on Olay.com for another scent/more moisturizing wash when I saw this lotion. I had no idea this in shower lotion existed.  So I purchased it from a local department store (cheaper than online) and have been using it for a couple weeks.  I am definitely hooked!!!  I will be a repeat buyer of this product.  It's sooooo much easier using this in the shower vs using regular lotion after the shower.  The scent is nice & stays on your skin.  This lotion also keeps your skin so soft & moisturized that you don't even need to apply any lotion after your shower.  I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!

Ginger Tea is my favorite to drink, especially when I have an upset stomach.  Usually I would cut up the ginger root and boil in hot water.  Then I tried the tea bags.  But I would need to use 2 or 3 bags to actually get the full effect.  I purchased this instant ginger in Jamaica & the clerk explained to me the difference between this and the tea bags.  I'm so glad I decided to try it b/c I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!! It's so strong and it works when I need it!  My only issue is that I didn't buy more than 1 box!
This laptop wrist rest fits my 17" laptop perfectly. It's comfortable and good to have if you use a laptop a lot. It definitely takes the pressure off your wrists.
This works great as a pH buffer.
This is perfect for exfoliating, though it's not as soft as I had hoped it would be, so I wouldn't use it on any sensitive areas. It's great for feet though!
Excellent, good quality product.
Very nice, soft wash cloths. When I need more, I will get these again.

This is an excellent water Kefir starter kit. I did a lot of water Kefir research prior to purchasing these so that I would know what I'm getting myself into and have everything ready for when these arrived. My batches all go through 2 fermentation cycles and my grains are quite happy. They have doubled over the course of 3 batches! If you want fizzies, make sure you get some fresh ginger and place a good tablespoon or two of thin sliced ginger or shredded ginger in your water Kefir's first fermentation cycle. Make sure you put the ginger in a muselin bag so that you don't have to pick out the bits later. The Kefir love it and not only do they grow faster with ginger, but it produces amazing carbonation.
Excellent bottle. It has a wide spraying area, so test it first before you start spraying things. It sprays evenly and doesn't leak.

Oh this is absolutely delicious. I use it to make homemade coffee ice cream. It's the perfect flavor and blends very nicely; no crystallization of the product after being incorporated into the ice cream. I needed an organic freeze dried instant coffee for my gourmet organic ice cream. I was worried I wasn't going to find the right one. I'm so glad I found Mount Hagen. I need to see if they make other products as well.

This thermometer is great in the fridge and to monitor the temp of the room where my Kefir ferments. However, it is not very accurate in the freezer. I think they should just take the word "Freezer" out of the product ad. I have other thermometers that are the analog mercury ones, with no special digital screens. In the fridge, the mercury thermometer matches this. Out in the open air they match as well. The only time this becomes inaccurate is in the freezer, and by a LOT. It tells me that my freezer is not frozen and is thawed, yet my mercury thermometer confirms it's -5 F and my ice cream is solid. I haven't thrown it out as I can still use it elsewhere in the house. I just use the mercury ones in the freezer.

I love how long it is. I really enjoy the LCD screen. It's very easy to use and appears to be quite accurate. My only complaint is the name of the product is "Instant Read Cooking Thermometer" and there is nothing instant about it. When I hear the word instant, I think... instant. I expected to have a full and accurate reading within say... 10 seconds? That's near instant. Unfortunately, this does take a good 30 seconds to finish climbing the numbers to the actual temperature. I find myself calculating how much the numbers are climbing and at what rate, seeing if I can turn it into a game of "what temp will it finally say it is". But that's my only complaint. It's a nice thermometer, just don't think it will be "instant".

I scoured Amazon and even non-Amazon sites for memory foam body pillows. I have knee pain from a baker's cyst and foot pain from a compressed nerve. I've been uncomfortable for months with my old, flat body pillow. I had an extra memory foam head pillow, but it wasn't long enough to separate my knees and my feet. I knew I needed a memory foam body pillow but wasn't sure they even exist. I looked at so many sites and found that there are really appx. 3 different memory foam body pillows out there (many different companies sell the same "brand"). I read every review on all of them. When I found this one, I already knew that when it arrives at my house it will be vacuum sealed to make it smaller for transport, and would require "fluffing".When it arrived I didn't just lay it out, I personally fluffed every inch, pinching and pulling the pieces apart. Memory foam can be forced down to a small size and made compact, so I wanted to make sure I affected every little foam piece and got them separated from each other. Since it was bent in the middle for shipping, I also actively redistributed the memory foam and slightly bulked up the center where I need the most support.. Once fluffed, it actually turned out to be a very large fluffy pillow. It's slightly heavy, but true memory foam pillows will be. I swap sides all night and have no trouble flopping this pillow from one side to the other as I roll with it between my legs. The bamboo cover really helps keep it cool. I was concerned the heaviness and size of the pillow would make me hot, but the bamboo prevents that. I also ordered a very large zippered body pillow cover that fits perfectly.The first night was the true test. I'm so used to waking up every hour or so in pain and tossing and turning, but I didn't! It was so wonderful. I got a real, full nights rest, no pain. Even better, I wasn't in pain in the morning. My knee and my foot didn't hurt. I am so glad they make this pillow, thank you for the wonderful sleep!For the pillowcase, I ordered the "Allersoft Cotton Body Dust Mite and Allergy Control Pillow Protector, 21 by 60-Inch". The open ended pillowcase that Amazon recommends with this product doesn't zip closed, so I decided to go with one that zips.

So, so soooooo tasty. I keep ordering these. Our whole family is addicted to them. I took some to work and ended up giving a tin to a co-worker too. Perfect for a quick breath freshener and it works great after a very spicy Asian dish to freshen the breath and take away some of the burn! :)

Let me start by saying I LOVE my new coat. It fits perfect with plenty of arm room. My husband said it hangs very nicely. I love the toggle construction; it's not plastic junk toggles. The hood is very large and perfect for me as I wanted to have extra wind protection.The only cons for me is that the coat arrived with some snags in it. Due to how it's constructed, it snags very easily, so I can see how it arrived that way before even being worn. But since I really like it I kept it. The other drawback is the chemical smell. I still have the smell and I got this a few weeks ago. It smells like the products used to pre-treat stain resistant couches. Oh well. I love it either way.
Seller, please start posting the dimensions of the cavities. These are so tiny. Great for mini-gift soap bars, but I really need something larger. :(

I can't write a good enough review for these stainless steel measuring spoons. They are incredible. They are heavyweight, durable, and the measurements are punched into the metal as opposed to being painted on. I needed these for my sensitive DIY organic recipes where no other metal would do. I'm so glad you guys make these!OH! And they have a slightly curled edge so you can lay it down (filled) and it doesn't just tip over and spill your powders/herbs!!

I needed a really good set of stainless steel measuring cups and these are perfect for me! I love that the measurements are not painted on, they are punched into the metal. Even better, the larger ones have punched in indicators for smaller measurements on the inside!
This sea butter is excellent. It works great in my recipes and was well sealed and packaged.
These things are FANTASTIC! They are silicone, which is great for the organic products I make at home. I don't want to use plastic, and these are perfect.

I'm not very happy with these. They don't write smoothly at all. My other dry erase markers have a nice smooth finish to the lines drawn. These have all the colors I want, but the ink they used makes it look grainy. Not smooth. :(I ended up purchasing the "Click Retractable Low-Odor Dry Erase Markers, Fine Tip, Assorted Colors, Set of 12" and have been incredibly pleased as the goes on nice and smooth and they don't have caps to mess with. They retract nicely.
Excellent mortar and pestle. I love the deep bowl. My herbs don't fling out at me. :)  The marble is nice and heavy and quite sturdy. I'm so glad I got this.

lol, I recall reading other people's complaints about these thermals being too small. I remember saying, my son is very skinny, I'll order 2 sizes larger and it will probably hang off of him. I was so wrong. We got the order and my son couldn't actually squeeze into the shirt. My son is 6 inches smaller around the chest than the posted size for this shirt on the bag and these shirts aren't very stretchy, so I can't imagine anyone fitting into these unless they order really really really large sizes.If you want thermals, great, but order way beyond your shirt size.

I just got my bottles. They are well made and sturdy. Although some expressed frustration at the difficulty in assembling the caps, we found it very easy. What is HARD is releasing the cap once you've closed the bottle! lol My husband and I laughed at the EZ Cap description. :)Anyways, I'm sure they will loosen up slightly. Until then, I am quite happy that they are so secure and seal up really nice. Perfect for the second fermentation process of water kefir. :)UPDATE: We were right and they loosened up just fine the next day after we had them capped a day. They secure really well and lock out the air! I just ordered another set. :)
Best lube out there... giggity.
This is definitely good compared to other brands, though I highly recommend their Manuka GOLD. It has a much better flavor, though it costs a bit more.

This is the best Manuka honey out there and I've tried a few! It has an excellent consistency, and a wonderful, smooth flavor. Other Manuka honeys I've had taste more medicinal, though I'd use it because it's great for my stomach ulcer. I have to admit, after just a week of use in the morning (before eating) and at night (before bed), my ulcer reduced to the point where I don't even notice it. Now that I've been using it for nearly a month, I believe it's completely healed. My ulcers have never healed so quickly and though I have no proof, I'm convinced this honey did the trick.
I love the flavor of these. I keep them around as a sweet treat, not just for throat irritations. I have 1-2 per day just to treat myself to something yummy that isn't massive and caloric.
Oh this tea is soooo good. Move over Lipton. This is my new favorite, and it's Organic.
This Ghee is amazing and is perfect in all my far East Indian dishes (and some not so far east dishes too!)
Excellent for split pea soup base!
I never knew Tabasco had so many flavors. I was very shocked to find Buffalo being my favorite and I use it on EVERYTHING, pizza, ham casserole... omg, yumm. Had to order more bottles.

My husband and I watch a lot of Science and History shows/documentaries. In fact, that's about all we care to watch. Big History was a great source of comedy to us. It reminded me of Idiocracy (the movie) where everything is overdramatized in a BIG way. Like: Big History makes Big connections and brings you BIG BIG BIG things that no one EVER connected before. Sometimes they make some BIG leaps and pass off BIG assumptions as BIG facts. You would swear that they actually discovered Moore's Law based on their BIG BIG final episode with the BIG revelation they make about their BIG connections. In fact, they make so many BIG recaps, you could really just watch the final episode and catch most of it.At least we had some BIG laughs. It was like stand up comedy night for us. In all fairness, they had some interesting facts that I didn't know about previously, but you have to take everything they say with a BIG grain of salt because they pass a lot of conjecture off as factual. This is probably good for 5th graders, but don't expect to keep teens or adults very interested.

I bought this pack of blacklight reactive "ball point" pens because I saw all the 5 star ratings. I wish I could give this anything but a 1. I would actually give them a 0 if I could.Here are my issues:- This is NOT "ball point" regardless of the name of the product. This is a fine tipped marker. There is no ball and the only point is the tip of the MARKER. :(- Despite the fact that the "pen" containers are different colors, they are simply one color. I assumed the yellow would be yellow, blue would be blue, etc. :(- The pink one was completely dry... as a bone. There was no reviving it with water or anything.- The blue and yellow ones had inoperable blacklights. Perhaps they were already dead batteries? I'm not sure and since they were watch batteries I couldn't do anything to change them to test this out.- And finally, the caps didn't stay on the ends of all but one of them! In fact, I was scratching my head wondering how on earth they went through the trouble of making such a product without making sure the caps would fit on the end as you are writing. If you want to use one of these, you have to set the cap down and use the pen.Did I just get unlucky? Or is it because this was made in China? I don't know, but it was frustrating because I really need to find some pens that DO work. Luckily, the seller was very professional and offered a refund. The seller also mentioned that they have never had problems selling thousands in the past and literally has had 2 complaints (mine being 1 of them). They think it was simply a bad batch. If anyone know of any good blacklight reactive pens, please reply with the name or link to the product. Thanks!

I would LOVE to give this a 5 stars. If I were rating it just based on how well it cleans silver, it would be a 5. But there are so many problems that I would NOT have purchased this product had I known beforehand.0 STARS for cancerSeriously?! Why isn't this mentioned on the web site that this product contains cancer-causing chemicals?!0 STARS for the containerI would NOT buy this product again, partly due to the container it comes in. When you open it for the first time to remove the plastic cover, USE GLOVES. The plastic does NOT come off without cutting into it. One you have pulled it off you will notice that it still has plastic all around the rim. My husband had to bring out a knife blade to go around the edges. The cancer-causing chemicals were all over my hands, his hands, and the counter. Yuck! To make matters worse, when you store it you need to store it in a plastic bag, because there is no SEAL to keep the lid on properly. Tip it just slightly and you have MORE cancer causing chemicals all over the place! This is ridiculous.5 STARS for silver cleaningTruly, this works wonderfully on very tarnished silver. It comes out looking great! But considering the downsides, this isn't worth it. There are other products out there you can get with better containers that will also do the job.

Oh no, where do I start...? My husband and I are seasoned psychonauts though we have never tried ayahuasca. We were looking for an informational-documentary-type video that shows the history of ayahuasca. We were also interested in seeing how it's made, how it's used, the effects, etc. Sadly, this video gave us NONE of that, and I mean none. This video is poorly done with terrible sound quality with no subtitles. It basically takes you on a small tour through the region where some people are still known to make their own ayahuasca, but didn't show anyone making it, consuming it, or even explain the effects or anything. The entire video is done in Spanish (because that's where they are) but with someone constantly translating to English. They really should have had the Spanish in there with English voice overs during editing, or perhaps use subtitles, anything. But had they done that we would have only had a 15 minute movie.On top of all the general disappointment, we hung in there, expecting to see this crew actually doing ayahuasca and document the effects and spiritual journeys. But no, none of that either. They show us the scenery as they go deeper into the jungle to find a spot to do it, but never do it on camera nor talk about it afterwards. To make matters worse, they had someone do their own little soundtrack that consisted of one very annoying (and loud) song over and over and over again. It was like fingernails on a chalk board. It was annoying. But again we endured hoping to see something interesting.About the only interesting tidbit was seeing Pablo Amaringo's art work. And even then they teased us by saying he did some amazing piece for them, but they weren't allowed to show it on camera and they could only look at it once a year themselves. Doh! They didn't show much of his art, so if I were you, I'd Google Pablo Amaringo. You would yield better results.It lacked everything we were interested in. It had 2 awards listed on the front and we later had a good laugh about those. They were insignificant, little known awards in some discreet location. Save yourself some time and money and just YouTube ayahuasca.

My 12 year old son is obsessed with Yin-Yang, so I decided to get him this necklace. When it arrived, right out of the package the rope strand was dislodged from the closure. Fortunately, I had some crazy glue around so I fixed that without any issues. My son wore it to school and came home and said the clasp wouldn't stay closed and it fell off him, after all, he does run around a lot. Since the necklace is big enough I decided to crazy glue the whole thing shut. Now it is perfect! The necklace is inexpensive, so I wasn't very disappointed or anything. I think the clasp could be better and I'm not sure why it came with the necklace already dislodged from the clasp, but eh, I'm not disappointed. My son loves it and wears it daily. :) It gets 5 stars for coolness and wearability, 3 stars for durability design.

I'm not sure what is up with the other guy giving a review, but there weren't many options for purchasing black lights on Amazon, so I decided to take a chance. Despite what he said, it did come in a 6-pack, which is perfect! I needed 4, and the other 2 will be my spares. They are great quality. I wasn't sure what to expect for quality simply because it's incandescent, but they are perfect. We are trying to make our bedroom very cool with neon paintings, lava lamps, etc. and this was the perfect addition. To the other guy who had problems, I sure hope you told them to send you the other 5. I'm sure it was just a shipping mix-up. It happens sometimes. We are all still human. ;)

I realize there are already many reviews for this, but I felt I should add mine as well. This is an AWESOME hand truck. I love how compact it is. I remember seeing it folded up when it arrived wondering how something so well compacted would expand into a sturdy hand truck. But wow, it easily expanded into its full size and is the perfect size for moving things around. We are in the middle of moving and this is perfect for lugging a couple boxes from one room to another. We have Ozarka water delivered to our home as well and found this is PERFECT for grabbing those water jugs and transporting them inside. When you are done using it, you can simply fold it up and store it. It doesn't feel flimsy, like I expected it to, and I love the foothold, which makes it easier to start your lifting. This was inexpensive. For something this excellent, I would have paid twice as much!

I got this harmonica for my son on his birthday along with other musical instruments. It appears to be a standard harmonica, but I was very surprised at how nice it sounds, especially for the price! It's nice and heavy and durable. I remember having a harmonica when I was a kid and it used to clog up and such, but this is very easy to use and hasn't clogged up yet. It's surprising that after buying multiple instruments, including a somewhat pricey keyboard, my son prefers to play this inexpensive harmonica. :) I would highly recommend this for any child OR adult.

These sandals are quite comfortable once you get the correct size figured out. The conversion chart didn't work so well for me and I had to return 1 pair and order a larger size. It's just one of those things where the European conversion doesn't always translate well, especially if your feet aren't entirely symmetrical. The sandals are quite comfortable and soft. The only drawback is I feel I should have opted for the sandals without the heel strap. I like to be able to slip in and out of sandals quickly. Although the strap is comfortable and holds the sandals on quite securely, the leather is still hard enough that I have to give quite a tug to release the strap and I spend more time than I would prefer "slipping in and out" of these. As a result, I still wear my crocs a lot. It's not just laziness, I had spinal surgery so it's harder for me to bend over like that. :( I think I will order another pair of these, only without the strap. Again, these are VERY nice and if you don't mind spending a couple seconds with the strap, get these!

I never thought I would be writing a review about a dog brush, seriously. But this thing is awesome! We have a 2 year old Cavalier King Charles Spaniel with medium length hair. She tends to get matted hair if not brushed very regularly and has long wavy hair on her ears. We tried a regular bristle brush and were completely disenchanted. This "Miracle Coat" dog brush is absolutely perfect though. We are able to cut down on how often she goes to the groomer by brushing her daily. She looks forward to it every day. It removes enough hair that we don't find huge clumps of hair just hanging around the edges of our hardwood floors any more. The hair is also quite easy to remove from the brush itself. You just kind of roll it off the brush. This size was perfect as well. Any bigger would have been too large for her breed. The bristles are strong enough to work out mats, but gentle enough to be used on her ears. I highly recommend this.

I am now officially a Whitelines fan! I had no idea something so simple as making the background slightly gray with white lines around the squares would make such a difference. The paper is excellent quality, and since it's a spiral book, it stays open and flat with ease. My husband and I love to freehand geometric drawings on a whim, and this is perfect for that. We keep graph paper everywhere now and the Whitelines brand is our favorite. When you write, your drawing/writing stands out more than the paper itself, which is how it should be! When you use the copy machine to make a copy of your design, the lines disappear and all that shows is your work. Lovely. I will be buying these again!
